text: [Allakh] predpisal vam v religii to, chto On zapovedal Nukhu, to, chto My dali tebe [, Mukhammad,] v otkrovenii, to, chto My zapovedali Ibrakhimu, Muse i 'Ise [, skazav]: "Soblyudayte [zavety] religii i ne vpadayte v protivorechiya otnositel'no neye". Tyazhko dlya mnogobozhnikov to, k chemu ty ikh zovesh'. Allakh izbirayet Sebe [v proroki], kogo pozhelayet, i priblizhayet k Sebe togo, kto povinuyetsya
